text: Colin Bean (15 April 1926 - 20 June 2009) was an English actor. He was best known for his role as Private Sponge in the BBC comedy series Dad's Army. He appeared in 45 episodes between 1968 and 1977. He also had roles in Are You Being Served?, Hi-de-Hi! and Z Cars. Bean was born in Wigan, Lancashire (now Greater Manchester).
